name: 7th International Academic Conference on Teaching, Learning and Education
content: TLECONF is an international conference on education to challenge you, inspire you, and help you change the way you do research and think, by featuring top professors, scholars, university lecturers, education science leaders, and students from various disciplines in the field. Itâ€™s not just the speakers that will share their knowledge, every participant of education conferences 2024 is expected to contribute to the knowledge exchange during three days of the conference from 19th to 21st of April 2024 in Athens, Greece. The organizing committee of the education conference will offer the participants an Athens city tour free of charge. New trends and modern approaches to education, emerging technologies, pedagogical methods and innovations, education-industry cooperation, inclusive learning and special education, education and international cooperation are just a few topics to be discussed at the international education conferences 2024.
